list_definition.definition: (of a person or his personality) gentle in temper or behaviour/behavior

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has such a mild temper.

list_definition.definition: (of weather especially if not in summer) not cold; rather warm
(of spices, spiced foods etc) not hot
